Title: ASP.NET Alerts
Description: Alerts, messageboxes, confirm buttons that can be used in ASP.NET and used from client-side code as well as server-side code.

Project Description

Alerts, messageboxes, confirm buttons that can be used in ASP.NET and used from client-side code as well as server-side code.

Another alert-like control

There is another implementation of that same concept in the Ajax Control Toolkit:
Ajax Control Toolkit ConfirmButton
